messages.text:
TopicA short documentary overview of World War II, covering key events, causes, and impacts.AudienceGeneral audience interested in history.Music ThemeSomber orchestral music with historical undertones to evoke the era.Video LengthRoughly 30 seconds (short-form overview).Video OrientationPortrait.Script PlanThe script will be automatically generated based on the topic, including narration on WW2's major events like the outbreak, key battles, and conclusion.Target LanguageEnglish (United States).AvatarOne adult male avatar in a professional, historical narrator style (e.g., suited, serious expression).VoiceAdult male voice with a neutral American accent, clear and authoritative for narration.Supplemental Footage (B-roll)Stock media of historical WW2 footage, maps, and photos to illustrate events.CaptionsEnabled.
Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.
